remarks: Equality theorem for restricted universal quantifier, with bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2004.)  (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)
statement:
raleq1f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
raleq1f.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
raleqf $p |- ( A = B -> ( A. x e. A ph <-> A. x e. B ph ) ) $.
